name: Maui (itch)
description:
Made for Weekly Game Jam 214:

https://itch.io/jam/weekly-game-jam-214

Gameplay Instructions:

  1. Move with WASD/Arrow keys
  2. Hit the enemy canoes with your oars
  3. Avoid the enemy bullets.

Based on :

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kamehameha_I#Maui_and_O%CA%BBahu
